content.p: Browse our guide of common terminology when considering admission to university. On this page you will find words commonly used by universities and Higher Education Institutions. No terminology avalable. Join our Facebook community Follow us on Instagram Head to X for latest news and events This depends on the individual course, as some courses will offer transfers from related courses, whereas some won't allow transfers of any kind due to the structure/requirements of the course. However, it is often the case that you can make an application through UCAS to apply to start in Year 1 (should you meet the entry requirements). Make an enquiry to ask any question about undergraduate or postgraduate courses at the University of Nottingham.
